Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is lightly spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of seven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393810) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393810)
